title: Current state of LLM agents
description: LLM agents are rising the hype cycle. But are they worth it?
author: Tridib Roy Arjo
body:

",s(e.p,{children:"Language models need to be aligned with our specific use case. Using generic pre-trained models often leads to vague responses, hallucinations, and potential harm."}),"
",h(e.p,{children:["While API providers like OpenAI offer access to base models and some fine-tuning capabilities, they still lack advanced alignment techniques like RLHF with algorithms such as ",s(e.a,{href:"https://arxiv.org/pdf/2402.03300",children:"GRPO"}),". As responsible developers, we should at minimum perform Supervised Fine-tuning (SFT) to adapt models to our specific needs."]}),"
",h(e.p,{children:["So we added built-in SFT and RL capabilities using GRPO to ",s(e.a,{href:"https://github.com/snayu-ai/zerve",children:"zerve"}),", the official agent system server for chetan. With chetan-serve, we can host both, the language models and agent systems in one server."]}),"
